messages.title: FAIR IS WORTH FIGHTING FOR
messages.content: Timothy Birt, as your Green MP, will promote local housing, local jobs and local services, thus building a stronger community. He has lived and worked in Dereham for nearly 20 years. This gives him wide experience of the Mid-Norfolk area.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Promote local housing to strengthen the community.
Promote local jobs and services to build a stronger community.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Vote Green to get a fairer deal for the people of Mid-Norfolk.

issues.environment: Tim has a broad science background. He takes a balanced view of controversial issues such as global warming and renewable energy. He believes government should provide honest guidance but ultimately people must make their own choices.

housing.content: Promote local housing to strengthen the community.

leaflet.personalStatement: Timothy Birt, as your Green MP, will promote local housing, local jobs and local services, thus building a stronger community.

politicalExperience.achievements: Developing better recycling system. Reducing government interference in people's lives.

endorsements.endorsement: Tim helping improve public spaces with Dereham Mayor Ann Bowyer.

quotes.text: I believe community issues must be at the heart of national politics. A Green MP will bring a sane voice to Westminster.

images.caption: Tim helping improve public spaces with Dereham Mayor Ann Bowyer.
